Package controllers

Class CreateNewOrderViewController

java.lang.Object
controllers.CreateNewOrderViewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientAware
public class CreateNewOrderViewController extends Object implements ClientAware
Handles the "Create New Reservation" workflow for subscribers Collects date, time and subscriber code, checks availability with the server, and finally builds an Order object. Screen flow: 1. User picks a date (1-8 days from now) and hour + quarter hour. 2. Client asks the server if the slot is free. 3. If free, an Order is created and passed to the summary screen.

  • Method Details

    • setClient

      public void setClient(ClientController client)
      Injects the active client controller.
      Specified by:
      setClient in interface ClientAware
      Parameters:
      client - the current ClientController instance

    • initializeCombo

      public void initializeCombo()
      Called once on screen load. Initializes the date picker and combo boxes with valid ranges.

    • dateChosen

      public void dateChosen()
      Called when the user selects a date. Fills hour dropdown based on the selected day and current time.

    • hourChoosen

      public void hourChoosen()
      Updates the minute selector in 15-minute increments when an hour is chosen.

    • addNewOrder

      public void addNewOrder()
      Creates an Order and asks the server to save it. Shows validation warnings for missing fields or terms box.

    • makingReservation

      public void makingReservation(boolean canOrder)
      Called after server confirms availability. Creates a new Order object and sends it to the server, or shows an error message if not possible.
      Parameters:
      canOrder - true if the slot is available

    • showTermsOfUse

      public void showTermsOfUse()
      Shows a modal dialog with the terms of use for the parking lot. The dialog is read-only and scrollable.

    • setOrderAndGoToNextPage

      public void setOrderAndGoToNextPage(Order order)
      Called by the ClientController when the order was successfully saved. Stores the order and navigates to the summary screen.
      Parameters:
      order - the confirmed Order

    • onReservationConflictCheck

      public void onReservationConflictCheck(boolean hasConflict)
      Handles the result of reservation conflict check. If there's a conflict, show a message and block the reservation. If not, continue to check for exact existing order.
      Parameters:
      hasConflict - true if subscriber already has a conflicting reservation
